metadata.description: Role-level benchmarks for enterprise software companies at $30-70B revenue scale with cloud + on-prem model. FTE_per_100M = typical FTEs per $100M annual revenue. Calibrated against a composite of enterprise software peers including SAP, Salesforce, Microsoft, ServiceNow, Workday. Sources: Technology & Services Benchmarking, SaaS Org Design studies, Gartner IT Key Metrics.
metadata.source: Composite of industry benchmarks for enterprise software vertical
metadata.context: Oracle has ~$53B revenue and ~164,000 total employees. Benchmarks reflect industry medians for enterprise software at scale â€” at $50B+ revenue, FTE-per-$100M ratios are lower than mid-market due to economies of scale, mature automation, and heavy partner leverage.

roles.description: Lead implementation and consulting engagements; manage timelines, budgets, client stakeholders. Serve customer success role throughout delivery.
Configure Fusion Apps, NetSuite, and on-prem applications to client requirements. Domain experts in ERP, HCM, CX, SCM modules.
Build integrations, data migrations, OCI infrastructure, database upgrades, and custom extensions.
Design technical solutions pre- and post-sale; integration architecture, cloud migration strategy, infrastructure sizing.
Manage large multi-module, multi-workstream implementations. PMO, status reporting, risk management.
Senior leaders managing practice areas, regional delivery, methodology, team staffing. P&L responsibility.
Own post-deployment relationship for cloud customers; drive adoption, expansion, retention. Focus on Fusion Apps and NetSuite.
Coordinate delivery for paid support customers (Premier, Mission Critical). Bridge between support and customer.
Designated technical relationship owner for enterprise accounts. Proactive monitoring, quarterly reviews, escalation management.
Manage contract renewal pipeline for cloud subscriptions; negotiate terms, forecast churn, manage expansion opportunities.
Tooling, process design, reporting, territory planning for CS organization. Gainsight/CRM admin.
Handle inbound support for Fusion Apps and SaaS products: how-to, configuration questions, basic troubleshooting.
Network Operations Center for OCI: infrastructure monitoring, incident detection, L1/L2 triage for cloud infrastructure.
Product-specific L2 for on-prem database, analytics, and legacy applications. Complex troubleshooting and configuration.
Paid-tier L1 support for Premier and Mission Critical customers. Dedicated product expertise across Oracle stack.
Senior paid-tier support handling complex cross-product issues. Manage escalation flow for Mission Critical customers.
Scheduling, queue management, SLA tracking, workforce planning across multiple product support orgs.
Create and maintain My Oracle Support knowledge base, troubleshooting guides, product documentation.
PMO for multi-company impact incidents on OCI. Coordinate cross-team response for critical cloud infrastructure events.
